name: A date with Tantei
description:
A free day in your life

A day you can spend on your loved ones.

So you decide to make plans with your boyfriend, Tantei.

10 Endings, no gender mentioned, and free to choose name.

Have fun with your life choices

There's one bug in the game, whenever you load, the bg music will go bye bye. So I recommend you to turn off the music completely and just turn on your own. I can't fix it because um. I'm only smart enough to write a script.

The soundtrack (Not by me, so check out this person, thanks to them this VN isn't a silent af game)

Check out my YouTube channel for more Tantei content: YouTube

Discord people go here:  https://discord.gg/dUbE2jHK7m

Thinking about making a Vietnamese translation for my friends rn.
